main event: A round or oval-shaped object was observed by two people near Dayton, Ohio on May 11th, 1962. The object was moving at a high rate of speed, descending rapidly, and then leveling off and accelerating before disappearing from sight.
interesting points: The object appeared to be glowing or emitting light as it descended.
The object made a sudden, jerky movement of about 100 yards at one point.
No sound was heard from the object.
The object was observed for approximately 2-3 minutes.
The observers were convinced it was a genuine UFO sighting.
